Using her secret powers to sneak out of the palace to influence affairs from behind the scenes, she ends up drawing the attention of the handsome imperial guard, Caisar Bethel. Though she avoided romance until now, could love finally bloom for this crazy flower?\n\n---\n“I, Melody Corbella, wish to marry him!” The rest of the table reacted in a cold enough manner for the Princess to feel ashamed, having raised her right arm vigorously with sparkles in her eyes.\n\nAnd then, Prince Deimos broke the silence to open his mouth, “We must not send a nutcase like her, Your Majesty!!”\n\nIt was finally the moment where all of her crazy deeds in the past came to fruition; because the only way she could escape being sent off for Royal Marriage was to throw away the image of a Princess that everyone expected.\n\nShe chose to cut her hair short and be reborn as the Crazy Flower in the Royal Palace.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/melody-the-crazy-flower-blooms/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14188)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4822)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4670)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4619)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112771)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4860)","fr":"Quand la princesse Mélodie Corbella déclare avec enthousiasme au cours d’une réunion d’état qu’elle souhaite faire un mariage princier, un vent glacial souffle sur l’assemblée. Seul le prince Deïmos réagit avec virulence et implore l’Empereur de ne surtout pas marier cette folle à qui que ce soit. Mélodie attendait cet instant depuis un an, un an à faire tout son possible pour quitter son image de princesse et à se faire passer pour une folle afin d’échapper à un mariage princier qu’elle refuse catégoriquement. Après s’être coupé les cheveux et avoir abandonné les robes pour des pantalons bien plus confortables, la princesse renaît en fleur sauvage.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80-%EB%AF%B8%EC%B9%9C-%EA%BD%83%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%94%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%82%98%EB%8B%A4/2994), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59603265)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/melody-the-crazy-flower-blooms/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14188)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4822)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4670)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4619)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112771)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/her-highness-the-wildflower/list?title_no=4860)","id":"Melody Corbella dikenal sebagai 'putri gila' di Kerajaan Corbella. 7cf945be-d5f5-4d09-82c5-46f6f28302ec:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7cf945be-d5f5-4d09-82c5-46f6f28302ec","title":{"en":"Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - Konosuba #5 Meguming-ui Chaeg (Doujinshi)"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"코노스바#5 메구밍의 책"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["bcfa196d-d162-45f5-a224-61d26b04a077"],"description":{},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"0234a31e-a729-4e28-9d6a-3f87c4966b9e","name":{"en":"Oneshot"}},{"id":"b13b2a48-c720-44a9-9c77-39c9979373fb","name":{"en":"Doujinshi"}}]}
7cfa33fb-143e-4217-aba9-90c521fa94cf:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7cfa33fb-143e-4217-aba9-90c521fa94cf","title":{"en":"The Abandoned Wife's Rebirth"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"废妻重生"},{"zh-ro":"Fei Qi Chong Sheng"},{"zh-ro":"Fèi Qī Chóng Shēng"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Wu Ruo couldn't see the true colors of the people around him until the day he died. The family of the friends who he treasured had been using him, and the husband who he neglected was the one who rescued him in the last moments. God's mercy allowed him to be reborn, reborn into his most useless, most hateful, and fattest times. At this period of his life, not only was he a waste unable to cultivate, but as a man, had to relive being married off to another man. But he found that this man... was actually pretty good to him. Knowing that death lies before her if she continues down the path the real Ariel has been going towards, she quickly breaks up with Duke Cedric Evans, who is not only the protagonist of the novel but a man who is cursed with a condition that causes him to become bloodthirsty when he does not smell a specific scent constantly. However, Cedric, who had been forced to date Ariel due to her status as his personal perfumer, suddenly seems reluctant to distance himself from her. Just what is wrong with this man, and how will this change the events of the novel? Will Ariel be able to live the life she wants?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%98-%EC%9C%A0%EC%9D%BC%ED%95%9C-%EC%A1%B0%ED%96%A5%EC%82%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2725), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57333037)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/the-tyrants-only-perfumer), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/thetyrantsonlyperfumer)","fr":"Que feriez-vous si vous vous réincarniez dans la peau d’Ariel Winston, une parfumeuse de génie qui est la seule à pouvoir créer le parfum qui sert de traitement contre la folie du Duc mais dont le destin tragique est d’être exécutée? On her way there, she fell in love with the man who transported her, Ryuuji, and insisted that he be her first sexual customer when she grew up. Now, she is approaching the time when she will lose her virginity, but will Ryuuji be able to be her first?  \n  \n2. Inazuma no Shou  \nWakana works in Yoshiwara, but she plans to one day buy her own way out. She seduces presents out of the men who buy her, in order to save money for her future. But one man, Mitsunori, is not like all the others. Will the skilled seductress Wakana be able to cope with real emotion?  \n  \n3. Is it possible for her to be rescued from this life?  \n  \n4. Nagasaki Bojou  \nOtaki, an oiran-in-training in Nagasaki, is slated to lose her virginity. However, she's been told she's going to have a Dutch man as a partner! She's frightened of sleeping with a foreigner who may not even speak her language! However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.","es-la":"Koji Aiba, que ha llevado una vida escolar ajena a las chicas, recibe de repente la visita de un misterioso fenómeno llamado \"Tiempo Perdido\", en el que el tiempo se detiene durante una hora al día. En un mundo en el que sólo pueden moverse ellos dos, poco a poco se van acercando más y más, y pronto sus sentimientos por Tokine se convierten en su primer amor. Sin embargo, parece que tiene un gran secreto que bloquea sus sentimientos.","ja":"女子とは無縁の学校生活を送っていた相葉孝司に突如訪れた、１日１時間だけ時が止まる不思議な現象“ロスタイム”。そんな静止した世界の中で、青春を取り戻そうとする孝司は、同じく止まった時の中動くことができる琥珀色の瞳をした少女・篠宮時音と出会う。二人だけしか動かない世界で徐々に距離を縮めていき、やがて時音への想いは初恋へと変わっていく。だが、彼女はその想いを遮るある大きな秘密を抱えているようで——。","ru":"Айба Кодзи проживал обычную школьную жизнь, не обращая внимания на девушек. Но неожиданно стало происходить странное явление — «потерянное время» — при котором каждый день на один час время останавливало свой ход. Và kết cục xảy ra cho cô ta là gì? هل هذه العلاقة جيدة حقًا؟\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=818598), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402562)\n\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://yonderstory.com/titles/1114)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6529469), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784518)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dagongdianxiazheshigewuhui/list?title_no=2066)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3906)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/grand-duc-c-etait-une-erreur/list?title_no=4241)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3855)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001870)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/challenge/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%84-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94/list?title_no=788773)","en":"I somehow kidnapped the Grand Duke I had a one-sided love for!\n\nTo hide this fact we had to pretend being in a relationship, but the Grand Duke is behaving strangely:\n\n\"Vivian, may I kiss you?\"\n\nHuh? Are we kissing as soon as we started dating?\n\n\"We'll kiss, then take take a step further and get married.\"\n\nIs this relationship going to be alright?\n\n---\nVivian Louis is the twenty-one-year-old daughter of a Count, a sweet and seemingly harmless girl who has only one guilty pleasure in life: thirsting after her crush, the breathtakingly handsome Grand Duke Lennox Elphidion Glenn! For her, it was love at first sight at the tender age of fourteen. That’s when she began obsessing over him, creating endless works of fan art and fan fiction. Then one day, an accident with her best friend’s magical crystal ball makes the unthinkable come true. The grand duke is kidnapped and tied up in her bed, and he’s telling her that she’s the kidnapper! Scrambling for a way out of this scandalous bind, the two agree to act like a couple. They even sign a one-year contract, but Lennox seems to want more than a fake relationship. Unbeknownst to Vivian, a full-blown romance is on its way. Could it be that her wildest fan fantasies will truly come to life?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=818598), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402562)\n\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://yonderstory.com/titles/1114)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6529469), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784518)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dagongdianxiazheshigewuhui/list?title_no=2066)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3906)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/grand-duc-c-etait-une-erreur/list?title_no=4241)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3855)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001870)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/challenge/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%84-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94/list?title_no=788773)","es":"¡Accidentalmente secuestré al gran duque por el que tengo un amor unilateral! Terminé aceptando la propuesta del gran duque de tener una relación contractual a cambio de solucionar este problema, pero...\n\n\"Vivian. ¿Puedo besarte?\"\n\n¿Eh? ¿Nos estamos besando tan pronto como comenzamos a salir?\n\n\"Nos besaremos, luego llevaremos las cosas más lejos, y luego nos casaremos, Vivian...\"\n\nEstoy en un gran problema. ¡No creo que el gran duque esté en su sano juicio...! ¿Está realmente bien esta relación?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=818598), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402562)\n\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://yonderstory.com/titles/1114)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6529469), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784518)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dagongdianxiazheshigewuhui/list?title_no=2066)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3906)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/grand-duc-c-etait-une-erreur/list?title_no=4241)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3855)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001870)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/challenge/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%84-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94/list?title_no=788773)","fr":"Vivianne Lewis est la fille d’une famille de noble de bas rang. Elle est amoureuse du Grand-duc Glenn depuis des années, mais n’a jamais osé espérer qu’il pose le regard sur elle. Alors lorsque, sous l’emprise d’un sort, elle se réveille sur le Grand-duc torse nu et poings liés, elle ne peut que s’imaginer l’avoir kidnappé... Mais est-ce vraiment le cas?\n\n---\nVivian est tombée amoureuse au premier regard du grand duc à l'âge de 14 ans et pendant les 7 années suivantes elle ne l'a jamais oubliée, alors lorsque qu'un jour par erreur elle l'enferme dans une pièce, et que la seule réaction du duc et de demander de l'épouser elle ne sait pas comment réagir! Cet amour est-il vraiment sincère?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=818598), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402562)\n\n[Official English Translation of the Novel](https://yonderstory.com/titles/1114)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6529469), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784518)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dagongdianxiazheshigewuhui/list?title_no=2066)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/it-was-a-mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3906)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/grand-duc-c-etait-une-erreur/list?title_no=4241)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/mistake-grand-duke/list?title_no=3855)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001870)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/challenge/%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%84-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94/list?title_no=788773)","id":"Selama 7 tahun Vivian fangirling pada Grand Duke Glann, bahkan satu kamarnya penuh dengan gambar Grand Duke tersebut! Mais lorsqu’elle se réveille, elle découvre qu’elle est dans le corps de la grande-duchesse elle-même et qu’elle a été téléportée au début du roman. Sachant déjà quel chemin Eloise va emprunter, Dakyung est prête à tout pour changer son destin et survivre jusqu’à la saison trois. Heureusement pour elle, une version plus jeune de Caien se retrouve entre ses mains, et elle va tout faire pour le garder à ses côtés.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57340673)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8532), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59278088), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10837), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/grand_duke_femme_fatale), [Nate](https://toonnbook.nate.com/detail/H042971354), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8786787), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042971354), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/4343000613)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14143)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/grand-duchess-was-secretly-a-villainess/list?title_no=5142)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Grand-Duchess-of-the-North-Was-Secretly-a-Villainess/550)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/106978)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north/list?title_no=4974)","id":"Kim Dakyung seumur hidupnya tidak pernah melakukan apa pun yang dia suka dan hidup mengikuti semua keinginan orang tuanya. Satu-satunya hal yang diperintahkan orang tuanya dan dia sukai adalah kendo dan membaca novel untuk mengisi waktunya. Tapi naas, saat sedang membaca novel kesukaannya, dia mati dan tiba-tiba masuk ke dalam novel itu. Terlebih dia menjadi tokoh yang akan mati di akhir season 2. Agar tidak mati lagi, dia berusaha keras untuk mengubah kehidupannya di dalam novel!\n\n---\nEloise Wayana, duchess agung dari Utara, dieksekusi oleh Kaisar Caien Helisis setelah terungkap bahwa dia diam-diam adalah penjahat selama ini. Ini menandai akhir musim kedua dari novel web trending terbaru, \"The Crown of Blood.\" Sebagai salah satu pembaca setianya, Kim Dakyung sangat menantikan musim berikutnya ketika dia tiba-tiba ditabrak truk dalam perjalanan pulang! Tapi begitu dia bangun kembali, dia menemukan bahwa dia berada di dalam tubuh Grand Duchess sendiri dan telah diteleportasi kembali ke awal novel. Sudah mengetahui jalan apa yang Eloise akan lalui, Dakyung putus asa untuk mengubah nasibnya dan bertahan hingga musim ketiga. Beruntung baginya, versi Caien yang lebih muda jatuh tepat ke tangannya, dan dia akan melakukan apa pun untuk membuatnya tetap di sisinyaEloise Wayana, duchess agung dari Utara, dieksekusi oleh Kaisar Caien Helisis setelah terungkap bahwa dia diam-diam adalah penjahat selama ini. Tapi begitu dia bangun kembali, dia menemukan bahwa dia berada di dalam tubuh Grand Duchess sendiri dan telah diteleportasi kembali ke awal novel. Sudah mengetahui jalan apa yang Eloise akan lalui, Dakyung putus asa untuk mengubah nasibnya dan bertahan hingga musim ketiga. Beruntung baginya, versi Caien yang lebih muda jatuh tepat ke tangannya, dan dia akan melakukan apa pun untuk membuatnya tetap di sisinya.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57340673)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/8532), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/59278088), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10837), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/grand_duke_femme_fatale), [Nate](https://toonnbook.nate.com/detail/H042971354), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8786787), [OneStory](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H042971354), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/4343000613)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14143)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/grand-duchess-was-secretly-a-villainess/list?title_no=5142)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north-was-secretly-a-villainess-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Grand-Duchess-of-the-North-Was-Secretly-a-Villainess/550)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/106978)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-grand-duchess-of-the-north/list?title_no=4974)","pt":"Eloise Wayana, a grã-duquesa do Norte, é executada pelo imperador Caien Helisis depois que é revelado que ela era secretamente uma vilã o tempo todo. Isso marca o final da segunda temporada do mais recente romance da web, *The Crown of Blood*. Como uma de suas ávidas leitoras, Kim Dakyung está esperando ansiosamente pela próxima temporada, quando de repente é atropelada por um caminhão a caminho de casa! Mas uma vez que ela desperta, ela descobre que está no corpo da grã-duquesa e foi teletransportada de volta ao início do romance. Já sabendo qual caminho Eloise seguirá, Dakyung está desesperada para mudar seu destino e sobreviver até a terceira temporada. Para sua sorte, uma versão mais jovem de Caien cai em suas mãos, e ela fará o que for preciso para mantê-lo ao seu lado.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57340673)\n\n**Original 7f025527-d5e9-4497-8916-3aae59e320f0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7f025527-d5e9-4497-8916-3aae59e320f0","title":{"en":"The Roommate Agreement"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Aramirang Samnida!"},{"en":"I Live With Aram!"},{"en":"아람이랑 삽니다!"}],"lastChapter":"55","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Lately, Yeji's life has been less up and more down. 7f7ee247-0587-4943-9d0d-5b78502610f0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7f7ee247-0587-4943-9d0d-5b78502610f0","title":{"en":"Black and White Story - Complete Works of Hiro Terada"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"白黒物語―寺田ヒロオ全集"}],"description":{"en":"Kuro-chan, the shadow master who is Shiro-chan's alter ego, is a reliable person who appears when called to help the weak. Today, my husband Shiro-chan and I are working hard to help those in need! Also included is \"Gokuro-san,'' in which the main character with outstanding athletic ability unfolds a school drama full of laughter and tears with sportsmanship in mind! A continuation of his masterpieces \"Sportsman Kintaro'' and \"Uniform Number 0''. Please enjoy the roots of the author, who is full of kindness towards others. This book, \"Black and White Monogatari,'' is the serialized debut work of Hiroo Terada, who is known by the nickname Tera-san to manga fans and was a leader of Tokiwa-sou. The magazine in which it appears is Manga Shonen, published by Gakudosha, which Terada himself called his \"ideal magazine.'' Terada, who moved to Tokyo in 1953 with the aim of becoming a manga artist, was selected to be featured in the magazine's \"Manga Tsuushinbo'' column, which was a gateway to success in the manga world. Two years later, this work was serialized from the April issue of 1955 to the October issue, but due to the bankruptcy of Gakudosha, the November issue was not published, making the work virtually unfinished. The review structure of \"Manga Tsuushinbo'' continues even during its serialization, and many manga artists such as Shotaro Ishinomori, Kazuo Umezu, Fujiko Fujio, Shinichi Suzuki, and Fujio Akatsuka have left the company."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}
